summary: This mod adjusts the appearance of Vignar Gray-Mane so that he no longer looks like a Redguard, but like a Nord (which he is). He is given the same skin color as his kinsmen Thorald Gray-Mane and Avulstein Gray-Mane.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Update July 31th, 2017[/b]
Anyone who wishes to port this mod to Skyrim Special Edition has my blessing to do so.[b]

Description[/b]
This mod adjusts the appearance of Vignar Gray-Mane so that he no longer looks like a Redguard, but like a Nord (which he is). He is given the same skin color as his kinsmen Thorald Gray-Mane and Avulstein Gray-Mane. I realize that it's possible for Nords to have darker skin, but it never made sense for Vignar to look so radically different from his own family members.

The main file is the English version, and a German version is available as an optional file. The only difference between them is that in the German version, Vignar's surname will be "Grau-Mähne" instead of "Gray-Mane".

[b]Compatibility[/b]
This is a microscopic fix which has no known compatibility issues with other mods.

[b]My other mods[/b][list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48193/?]Ulvhild - Nord Housecarl for Lakeview Manor[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48626/?]Realistic Animal Loot[/url][/list]
author: eriknm

files.name: Consistent Vignar Gray-Mane
files.changelogHtml: This version resolves a mismatch between Vignar's face color and body color. In the previous version, his hands would still appear dark-skinned.

files.name: Consistent Vignar Gray-Mane - German version
files.changelogHtml: This is likely the final version of this mod. It includes the esp-file which is necessary in order for Vignar's face and body to consistently match. Sorry about not having included it in the previous version.

files.name: Consistent Vignar Gray-Mane
files.changelogHtml: Vignar's surname now appears as "Gray-Mane" rather than "Grau-Mähne" (unless you download the German version of the mod).
